traits.Charge: If the kow moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.
traits.Stench: Any creature other than a stench kow that starts its turn within 5 feet of the stench kow must succeed on a DC 12+1d4 + 10 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all stench kows for 1 hour.
